page.title: 13THE CHURCH:WOKINGHAM
page.content: This{Victorian brick-built Anglican church in the ecclesiastical parish of {St.Sebastian}has a wooden single {bellcot}and large{stained glass windows. An extension added in 1983 can be screened off for church meetings and has kitchen and toilet facilities.The church is gas-heated. A {war memorial}stands in the graveyard. The Rev. Derek Burden,was inducted in 1984. Daily services are held and all are welcome. 170 people attend church regularly, the{Sunday Family Communion is the main service.There are 2 Churchwardens, deanery synod reps. and 10 elected members of the Parochial Church Council. Music is provided by a{choir}of 26,trained by the{organist}whose salary is Â£520 per annum.His fees are Â£11 for weddings, Â£10 for funerals.Top choristers earn Â£1.50 and juniors 80p. for weddings.
